item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Metacognitive laziness: Effects of generative AI on learning motivation (102 points | 77 comments)
2. 0click deanonymization attack targeting Signal, Discord and other platforms (27 points | 1 comment)
3. Show HN: Printercow – Turn any thermal printer into an API endpoint (34 points | 37 comments)
4. Kimi K1.5: Scaling Reinforcement Learning with LLMs (122 points | 13 comments)
5. DeepSeek-R1 (1485 points | 517 comments)
6. Show HN: Amurex – An open source AI meeting copilot (22 points | 12 comments)
7. Reverse engineering Call of Duty anti-cheat (393 points | 130 comments)
8. People are bad at reporting what they eat. That's a problem for dietary research (111 points | 164 comments)
9. 'It's a nightmare': couriers mystified by the algorithms that control their jobs (46 points | 23 comments)
10. Mixxx: GPL DJ Software (560 points | 120 comments)
11. 417-megapixel Andromeda galaxy panorama took over a decade to make (219 points | 75 comments)
12. I am (not) a failure: Lessons learned from six failed startup attempts (448 points | 265 comments)
13. The Sonnenschein-Mantel-Debreu Results After Thirty Years (18 points | 3 comments)
14. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney, who does work for YC and startups. AMA (332 points | 345 comments)
15. Regency Sex Ed: How did women in 19th C. Europe learn about the birds and bees? (66 points | 23 comments)
16. Fixing a uname bug (Apache NuttX RTOS) (24 points | 5 comments)
17. Startup Winter: Hacker News Lost Its Faith (364 points | 235 comments)
18. Using eSIMs with devices that only have a physical SIM slot via a 9eSIM SIM car (358 points | 204 comments)
19. SRCL: Open-source React project to build web apps with terminal aesthetics (153 points | 22 comments)
20. Unlink vs. DEL – A deep dive into how it works internally in Redis (16 points | 11 comments)
21. Celestial Navigation for Drones (193 points | 114 comments)
22. Where do those undergraduate divisibility problems come from? (142 points | 44 comments)
23. Guitar chord karaoke with Vamp, Chordino, and FFmpeg (2022) (111 points | 33 comments)
24. Zork: The Great Inner Workings (2020) (187 points | 63 comments)
25. Show HN: Personalized Duolingo (kind of) for vocabulary building (139 points | 39 comments)
26. ROCm Device Support Wishlist (179 points | 133 comments)
27. Remarks to Software Forum Dinner Meeting (1997) (6 points | 1 comment)
28. Kronotop: Redis-compatible, transactional document store backed by FoundationDB (72 points | 19 comments)
29. YC X25, the spring 2025 batch (62 points | 37 comments)
30. Flag drawing with Turtle (31 points | 6 comments)
